Package fr.univlille.iutinfo.view

Class MazeView

java.lang.Object
javafx.stage.Window
javafx.stage.Stage
fr.univlille.iutinfo.view.MazeView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class MazeView extends javafx.stage.Stage implements Observer
The MazeView class represents the view for the players in the game. It extends the Stage class and implements the Observer interface.

  • Property Summary

    • whoPlays

      protected static boolean whoPlays
      A boolean representing who is playing.

      True means that it's the monster's turn. False means that it's the hunter's.

    • MazeView

      hunter - The hunter entity
